articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Algerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Algerian President
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the start of revolution in Algeria.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, wishing the president and the people of Algeria greater success in the work for national unity and unity and the prosperity and development of the country and him good health and happiness.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Algerian PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Algerian PM 
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Ahmed Ouyahia, prime minister of Algeria, on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the  start of revolution in Algeria.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him greater success in the work for prosperity of the country and welfare of the people. 
					
					 Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Mourad Medelci, foreign minister of Algeria, on the same day.

articles.title: GNP's Unpopular Action Flayed
articles.content:
GNP's Unpopular Action Flayed 
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea held a press conference on Oct. 26 to slap down the unpopular action of the "Grand National Party".
					 He accused the representative of the GNP of claiming at the "National Assembly" held on the same day that the party would deal with the budget for the project of improving the four large rivers till early December without fail while threatening the opposite party and the people.
					
					 His remarks are run through with arrogance and highhandedness as they mean that not a penny of the budget would be allocated for the sake of the people's living, he charged.
					
					 He said that there is no room whatsoever for the party to stay in the NA as it unilaterally defends the unpopular budget proposal submitted by the "government" and abandons parliamentary function by itself.
					
					 If the GNP persistently cries out for the budget, it would never get rid of the dishonor as an unpopular party serving big businesses, he warned.
					
					 The huge expenditure for the project rejected by the people would not be allowed at all, he noted, adding the Democratic Labor Party will struggle for blocking the passage of the budget through the NA.

articles.title: CPV's Entry into Korean Front Observed
articles.content:
CPV's Entry into Korean Front Observed
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK consulate general in Shenyang, China hosted a reception on Oct. 25 to mark the 60th anniversary the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.
					 A vice-governor of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government recalled in his speech at the reception that the armies and peoples of China and the DPRK fought shoulder to shoulder in the hard-fought and do-or-die war to defeat the U.S. imperialist aggressors and win a great victory.
					
					 The great patriotism and the revolutionary heroism displayed in the war of resisting America and aiding Korea have brilliantly been recorded in the history of the nation of China and the people of the DPRK as the most valuable mental wealth of the two peoples, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Commemorating the 60th anniversary of the CPV's entry into the Korean front is to carry forward the glorious traditions of the revolutionary martyrs and learn from their noble spirit to build their country and provide a joint defence of peace and stability in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 China and the DPRK are consolidating the traditional bilateral friendship sealed in blood, the governor said, expressing the will to work hard to boost the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations together with the comrades of the DPRK.

articles.title: Korea Friendship Association headquartered Held
articles.content:
Korea Friendship Association headquartered Held
Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain held an annual meeting under the theme of "Supporting the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the Proposal for Founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo" in Barcelona on Oct. 23.
					 A report was made by Chairman of the association Alejandro Cao de Benos to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos in his report referred to the fact that General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided the historic north-south summit and saw to it that the June 15 joint declaration was adopted and published, adding:
					
					 The publication of the declaration was a historic event which provided a turning point in the reunification movement of the Korean people and marked an important occasion in promoting understanding between the north and the south and bringing earlier the day of the independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration, the program for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, brought a rosy future for the reunification movement of the Korean nation.
					
					 The chairman of the association recalled that President Kim Il Sung put forward the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and clarified the 10-point policy to be carried out by the federal state.
					
					 He called on all the members of the association to make positive efforts to realize the reunification of Korea, the behest of the President, at an early date.
					
					 The representatives of the British and German branches of the association and other speakers praised Kim Il Sung as a great man who devoted his whole life to the reunification of the country, adding that the immortal exploits performed by him for national reunification are shining more brightly under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
